title: Toni Morrison's Legacy
description: Wesley Morris, Parul Sehgal and Dwight Garner talk about Morrison’s career, and Sarah M. Broom talks about her debut memoir, “The Yellow House.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
